name: PXBlueColors
description: PX Blue colors for Eaton applications

scripts.build:colors: cd ui && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:colors-branding: cd branding && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:all: npm run build:colors && npm run build:colors-branding
scripts.publish:colors: npm run build:colors && cd ui && npm version patch && npm publish && cd .. && exit 0
scripts.publish:colors-branding: npm run build:colors-branding && cd branding && npm version patch && npm publish && cd .. && exit 0
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:colors && npm run publish:colors-branding && exit 0

author: px-blue <pxblue@eaton.com>
